name: Shirin
wishText: You are so full of life that even death would find you alive. Stay like that always!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Many many happy retur.....
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: You are and will forever be a cherished part of my life.
replayText: Please, don't ever be a stranger
